str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
A conjunction, preposition and adverb of continuance, until.
Today, now. Neuter of a presumed compound of the article ho and hemera; on the day; generally, now.
When, whenever, at which time. Of uncertain affinity; at which time.
Or Moses, or Mouses of Hebrew origin; Moseus, Moses, or Mouses, the Hebrew lawgiver.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To read, know again, know certainly, recognize, discern. From ana and ginosko; to know again, i.e. to read.
A covering, especially a covering of head and face, a veil. From kalupto; a cover, i.e. Veil.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To lie, recline, be placed, be laid, set, specially appointed, destined. Middle voice of a primary verb; to lie outstretched.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.
